title: 半砖插件怎么给玩家权限
txt_content: 半砖插件怎么给玩家{:10_522:}权限 求解

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content: scs.create.buyAllow /scs buy <arguments>scs.create.sellAllow /scs sell <arguments>scs.create.displayAllow /scs display <arguments>scs.create.exchangeAllow /scs exchange <arguments>scs.create.unlimitedAllow /scs <buy/sell> <item/this> unlimited <arguments>scs.useAllow buying and selling from showcasesscs.manageAllow use of /scs owner, /scs price, /scs amountscs.removeAllow use of /scs removescs.adminAllow use of scs.manage and scs.remove commands on anybody's showcases

jiuerd 发表于 2014-7-4 17:39
大哥给我发个中文的   这个我看不懂{:10_513:}

992854254 发表于 2014-7-4 17:57
大哥给我发个中文的   这个我看不懂
顺便教我怎么给权限

replies.author: 闫诺
replies.txt_content: /mangaddp 组 权限 ： 添加组的权限

replies.author: a799760183
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder scs.create.buy
/mangaddp builder scs.create.sell
/mangaddp builder scs.create.display
/mangaddp builder scs.use

闫诺 发表于 2014-7-4 18:49
/mangaddp 组 权限 ： 添加组的权限
怎么给所有人

a799760183 发表于 2014-7-4 20:35
/mangaddp builder scs.create.buy
/mangaddp builder scs.create.sell
/mangaddp builder scs.create.disp ...
我是要给玩家买和卖的权限

replies.author: a799760183
replies.txt_content:
992854254 发表于 2014-7-7 16:48
我是要给玩家买和卖的权限
/mangaddp builder scs.use

a799760183 发表于 2014-7-7 19:55
/mangaddp builder scs.use
我要给所有人的大哥求你勒帮帮我把   要不然服务器开不下去了啊·
